00010 #ifndef _AABBTEST_H_
00011 #define _AABBTEST_H_
00012 
00013 #include "AABB.h"
00014 #include "Assertion.h"

00016 template <int N>
00017 void AABB<N>::Test() {
00018     SmokeTest();
00019     TestRadAndDia();
00020     TestOffset();
00021     TestMin();
00022     TestMax();
00023     TestContains();
00024     TestOverlaps();
00025     TestDistance();
00026     TestNearbyWalls();
00027     TestSweep();
00028     TestSweepLine();
00029     TestSweepComplicated();
00030 }
00031 
00032 template <int N>
00033 void AABB<N>::SmokeTest() {
00034     AABB<N> test;
00035     ASSERT(test.center() == (Vector<N>(0, 0)));
00036     ASSERT(test.radius() == (Vector<N>(0, 0)));
00037 
00038     AABB<N> test2(Vector<N>(10, -10), Vector<N>(0, 50));
00039     ASSERT(test2.center() == (Vector<N>(10, -10)));
00040     ASSERT(test2.radius() == (Vector<N>(0, 50)));
00041 
00042     AABB<N> test3(Vector<N>(10, 10), Vector<N>(-10, 10));
00043     ASSERT(test3.center() == (Vector<N>(10, 10)));
00044     ASSERT(test3.radius() == (Vector<N>(10, 10)));
00045 }
00046 
00047 template <int N>
00048 void AABB<N>::TestRadAndDia() {
00049     AABB<N> test;
00050     ASSERT(test.radius() == (Vector<N>(0, 0)));
00051     ASSERT(test.radius(0) == 0);
00052     ASSERT(test.radius(1) == 0);
00053     ASSERT(test.diameter(0) == 0);
00054     ASSERT(test.diameter(1) == 0);
00055 
00056     AABB<N> test2(Vector<N>(10, -10), Vector<N>(-5, 50));
00057     ASSERT(test2.radius() == (Vector<N>(5, 50)));
00058     ASSERT(test2.radius(0) == 5);
00059     ASSERT(test2.radius(1) == 50);
00060     ASSERT(test2.diameter() == (Vector<N>(10, 100)));
00061     ASSERT(test2.diameter(0) == 10);
00062     ASSERT(test2.diameter(1) == 100);
00063     
00064 }
00065 
00066 template <int N>
00067 void AABB<N>::TestOffset() {
00068     AABB<N> test;
00069     test.offsetCenter(Vector<N>(5, 5));
00070     ASSERT(test.m_center == (Vector<N>(5,5)));
00071     test.offsetCenter(Vector<N>(-5, -5));
00072     ASSERT(test.m_center == (Vector<N>(0,0)));
00073 }
00074 
00075 template <int N>
00076 void AABB<N>::TestMin() {
00077     AABB test(Vector<N>(10, -10), Vector<N>(5, 50));
00078     ASSERT(test.min() == (Vector<N>(5, -60)));
00079     ASSERT(test.min(0) == 5);
00080     ASSERT(test.min(1) == -60);
00081 }
00082 
00083 template <int N>
00084 void AABB<N>::TestMax() {
00085     AABB test(Vector<N>(10, -10), Vector<N>(5, 50));
00086     ASSERT(test.max() == (Vector<N>(15, 40)));
00087     ASSERT(test.max(0) == 15);
00088     ASSERT(test.max(1) == 40);
00089 }
00090 
00091 template <int N>
00092 void AABB<N>::TestTouching() {
00093     AABB test1(Vector<N>(0, 0), Vector<N>(5, 5));
00094     AABB test2(Vector<N>(10, 10), Vector<N>(5, 5));
00095     AABB test3(Vector<N>(1, 1), Vector<N>(3, 3));
00096     AABB test4(Vector<N>(0, 0), Vector<N>(10, 1));
00097     ASSERT( test1.overlaps(test2));
00098     ASSERT( test1.overlaps(test3));
00099     ASSERT( test1.overlaps(test4));
00100     ASSERT(!test2.overlaps(test3));
00101     ASSERT(!test2.overlaps(test4));
00102     ASSERT( test3.overlaps(test4));
00103 }
00104 
00105 template <int N>
00106 void AABB<N>::TestContains() {
00107     AABB test(Vector<N>(10, -10), Vector<N>(5, 50));
00108     ASSERT(!test.contains(Vector<N>(5, -60)));
00109     ASSERT(!test.contains(Vector<N>(5, 40)));
00110     ASSERT(!test.contains(Vector<N>(15, 40)));
00111     ASSERT(!test.contains(Vector<N>(15, -60)));
00112     ASSERT(test.contains(Vector<N>(10, -10)));
00113     ASSERT(test.contains(Vector<N>(8, -20)));
00114 }
00115 
00116 template <int N>
00117 void AABB<N>::TestOverlaps() {
00118     AABB test1(Vector<N>(0, 0), Vector<N>(5, 5));
00119     AABB test2(Vector<N>(10, 10), Vector<N>(5, 5));
00120     AABB test3(Vector<N>(1, 1), Vector<N>(3, 3));
00121     AABB test4(Vector<N>(0, 0), Vector<N>(10, 1));
00122     ASSERT(!test1.overlaps(test2));
00123     ASSERT( test1.overlaps(test3));
00124     ASSERT( test1.overlaps(test4));
00125     ASSERT(!test2.overlaps(test3));
00126     ASSERT(!test2.overlaps(test4));
00127     ASSERT( test3.overlaps(test4));
00128 }
00129 
00130 template <int N>
00131 void AABB<N>::TestDistance() {
00132     AABB test1(Vector<N>(0, 0), Vector<N>(5, 5));
00133     AABB test2(Vector<N>(10, 10), Vector<N>(5, 5));
00134     AABB test3(Vector<N>(10, 10), Vector<N>(2, 1));
00135     AABB test4(Vector<N>(10, 0), Vector<N>(2, 2));
00136 
00137     ASSERT(test1.distanceFrom(test2) == 0);
00138     ASSERT(test2.distanceFrom(test3) == 0);
00139     ASSERT(test1.distanceFrom(test3) == 5);
00140     ASSERT(test1.distanceFrom(test4) == 3);
00141 }
00142 
00143 template <int N>
00144 void AABB<N>::TestNearbyWalls() {
00145     AABB sRight(Vector<N>(2, 0), Vector<N>(0, 1));
00146     AABB lRight(Vector<N>(2, 0), Vector<N>(0, 3));
00147     AABB vRight(Vector<N>(3, 0), Vector<N>(1, 0));
00148     AABB nRight1(Vector<N>(2, 3), Vector<N>(0, 1));
00149     AABB nRight2(Vector<N>(2, 4), Vector<N>(0, 1));
00150 
00151     AABB sLeft(Vector<N>(-2, 0), Vector<N>(0, 1));
00152     AABB lLeft(Vector<N>(-2, 0), Vector<N>(0, 3));
00153     AABB vLeft(Vector<N>(-3, 0), Vector<N>(1, 0));
00154     AABB nLeft1(Vector<N>(-2, 3), Vector<N>(0, 1));
00155     AABB nLeft2(Vector<N>(-2, 4), Vector<N>(0, 1));
00156 
00157     AABB sTop(Vector<N>(0, 2), Vector<N>(1, 0));
00158     AABB lTop(Vector<N>(0, 2), Vector<N>(3, 0));
00159     AABB vTop(Vector<N>(0, 3), Vector<N>(0, 1));
00160     AABB nTop1(Vector<N>(3, 2), Vector<N>(1, 0));
00161     AABB nTop2(Vector<N>(4, 2), Vector<N>(1, 0));
00162 
00163     AABB sBottom(Vector<N>(0, -2), Vector<N>(1, 0));
00164     AABB lBottom(Vector<N>(0, -2), Vector<N>(3, 0));
00165     AABB vBottom(Vector<N>(0, -3), Vector<N>(0, 1));
00166     AABB nBottom1(Vector<N>(3, -2), Vector<N>(1, 0));
00167     AABB nBottom2(Vector<N>(4, -2), Vector<N>(1, 0));
00168 
00169     AABB center(Vector<N>(0,0), Vector<N>(2,2));
00170     ASSERT(center.nearbyWalls(sRight) == RIGHT_WALL);
00171     ASSERT(center.nearbyWalls(lRight) == RIGHT_WALL);
00172     ASSERT(center.nearbyWalls(vRight) == RIGHT_WALL);
00173     ASSERT(!center.nearbyWalls(nRight1));
00174     ASSERT(!center.nearbyWalls(nRight2));
00175 
00176     ASSERT(center.nearbyWalls(sLeft) == LEFT_WALL);
00177     ASSERT(center.nearbyWalls(lLeft) == LEFT_WALL);
00178     ASSERT(center.nearbyWalls(vLeft) == LEFT_WALL);
00179     ASSERT(!center.nearbyWalls(nLeft1));
00180     ASSERT(!center.nearbyWalls(nLeft2));
00181 
00182     ASSERT(center.nearbyWalls(sTop) == CEILING);
00183     ASSERT(center.nearbyWalls(lTop) == CEILING);
00184     ASSERT(center.nearbyWalls(vTop) == CEILING);
00185     ASSERT(!center.nearbyWalls(nTop1));
00186     ASSERT(!center.nearbyWalls(nTop2));
00187 
00188     ASSERT(center.nearbyWalls(sBottom) == FLOOR);
00189     ASSERT(center.nearbyWalls(lBottom) == FLOOR);
00190     ASSERT(center.nearbyWalls(vBottom) == FLOOR);
00191     ASSERT(!center.nearbyWalls(nBottom1));
00192     ASSERT(!center.nearbyWalls(nBottom2));
00193 
00194     AABB eleven(Vector<N>(2656.037109f, -2219.243652f), Vector<N>(13.962769f,64.353516f));
00195     AABB twelve(Vector<N>(2740.0f,-2250.0f), Vector<N>(70.0f,0.0f));
00196     ASSERT(eleven.nearbyWalls(twelve) == RIGHT_WALL);
00197 
00198     AABB one(Vector<N>(1659.371094f, -75.646576f), Vector<N>(13.962830f,64.353409f));
00199     AABB two(Vector<N>(1680,-139.999985f), Vector<N>(10.0f,0.0f));
00200     ASSERT(one.nearbyWalls(two) == FLOOR);
00201 
00202     AABB three(Vector<N>(2129.325684f, -75.646576f), Vector<N>(13.962769f,64.353409f));
00203     AABB four(Vector<N>(2140,-149.999985f), Vector<N>(0.0f,10.0f));
00204     ASSERT(three.nearbyWalls(four) == FLOOR);
00205 }

00207 template <int N>
00208 void AABB<N>::TestSweep() {
00209     AABB A0(Vector<N>(0, 5), Vector<N>(1, 2));
00210     AABB A1(Vector<N>(0, -5), Vector<N>(1, 2));
00211     AABB B0(Vector<N>(5, 0), Vector<N>(2, 1));
00212     AABB B1(Vector<N>(-5, 0), Vector<N>(2, 1));
00213     AABB C0(Vector<N>(0, 0), Vector<N>(3, 3));
00214     AABB C1(Vector<N>(5, 5), Vector<N>(3, 3));
00215 
00216     Real r0, r1;
00217     ASSERT(!AABB::Sweep(A0, A0, B0, B0, r0, r1));
00218     ASSERT(!AABB::Sweep(A0, A1, B0, B0, r0, r1));
00219     ASSERT(!AABB::Sweep(A0, A0, B0, B1, r0, r1));
00220 
00221     ASSERT(AABB::Sweep(A0, A1, B0, B1, r0, r1));
00222     ASSERT(r0 == .2f); ASSERT(r1 == .8f);
00223 
00224     ASSERT(AABB::Sweep(A1, A0, B1, B0, r0, r1));
00225     ASSERT(r0 == .2f); ASSERT(r1 == .8f);
00226 
00227     ASSERT(AABB::Sweep(A0, A1, C0, C1, r0, r1));
00228     ASSERT(r0 == 0); ASSERT(r1 == (2.0f / 3.0f));
00229 
00230     ASSERT(AABB::Sweep(B0, B1, C0, C1, r0, r1));
00231     ASSERT(r0 == 0); ASSERT(r1 == (2.0f / 3.0f));
00232 
00233     AABB wall(Vector<N>(10, 0), Vector<N>(0, 40));
00234     AABB box(Vector<N>(0, 0), Vector<N>(2, 2));
00235     ASSERT(!AABB::Sweep(box, Vector<N>(-10, 0), wall, Vector<N>(0, 0), r0, r1));
00236     ASSERT(!AABB::Sweep(wall, Vector<N>(0, 0), box, Vector<N>(-10, 0), r0, r1));
00237 
00238     ASSERT(AABB::Sweep(box, Vector<N>(10, 0), wall, Vector<N>(0, 0), r0, r1));
00239     ASSERT(r0 == .8f); ASSERT(r1 == 1);
00240 
00241     ASSERT(AABB::Sweep(wall, Vector<N>(0, 0), box, Vector<N>(10, 0), r0, r1));
00242     ASSERT(r0 == .8f); ASSERT(r1 == 1);
00243 }
00244 
00245 template <int N>
00246 void AABB<N>::TestSweepLine() {
00247     AABB A0(Vector<N>(0, 0), Vector<N>(1, 1));
00248     AABB A1(Vector<N>(10, 3), Vector<N>(1, 1));
00249     AABB line(Vector<N>(5, 0), Vector<N>(0, 5));
00250 
00251     Real r0, r1;
00252     ASSERT(AABB::Sweep(A0, A1, line, line, r0, r1));
00253     ASSERT(r0 == .4f); ASSERT(r1 == .6f);
00254 }
00255 
00256 template <int N>
00257 void AABB<N>::TestSweepComplicated() {
00258     AABB one(Vector<N>(-18.704742f, -145.646576f), Vector<N>(13.962831f, 64.353409f));
00259     AABB two(Vector<N>(150.000000f, -89.999985f), Vector<N>(0, 39.999996f));
00260 
00261     Real r0, r1;
00262     ASSERT(!AABB::Sweep(one, Vector<N>(-0.3, 0), two, Vector<N>(0,0), r0, r1));
00263     
00264     AABB three(Vector<N>(0,2), Vector<N>(2,2));
00265     AABB four(Vector<N>(0,0), Vector<N>(100,0));
00266     ASSERT(!AABB::Sweep(three, Vector<N>(-10, 0), four, Vector<N>(0,0), r0, r1));
00267 
00268     AABB five(Vector<N>(163.962830,14.353426), Vector<N>(13.962830,64.353416));
00269     AABB six(Vector<N>(150,-89.999985), Vector<N>(0,39.999996));
00270     ASSERT(!AABB::Sweep(five, Vector<N>(-.3, 0), six, Vector<N>(0,0), r0, r1));
00271 
00272     AABB seven(Vector<N>(163.962814,14.353418), Vector<N>(13.962814,64.353416));
00273     AABB eight(Vector<N>(150,-89.999985), Vector<N>(0,39.999996));
00274     ASSERT(!AABB::Sweep(seven, Vector<N>(-.3, 0), eight, Vector<N>(0,0), r0, r1));
00275     
00276     AABB nine(Vector<N>(-237.437195f, -985.646606f), Vector<N>(13.962799f,64.353394f));
00277     AABB ten(Vector<N>(-240.0f,-1105.0f), Vector<N>(0.0f,55.000004f));
00278     ASSERT(!AABB::Sweep(nine, Vector<N>(0, 10.476000f), ten, Vector<N>(0,0), r0, r1));
00279     
00280     AABB eleven(Vector<N>(0, 0), Vector<N>(4,10));
00281     AABB twelve(Vector<N>(10,0), Vector<N>(0,70));
00282     AABB thirteen(Vector<N>(10,0), Vector<N>(2,0));
00283     AABB fourteen(Vector<N>(14,0), Vector<N>(2.00001,0));
00284     ASSERT(AABB::Sweep(eleven, Vector<N>(10, 0), twelve, Vector<N>(0,0), r0, r1));
00285     ASSERT(AABB::Sweep(eleven, Vector<N>(10, 0), thirteen, Vector<N>(0,0), r0, r1));
00286     ASSERT(!AABB::Sweep(thirteen, Vector<N>(0, 0), fourteen, Vector<N>(0,0), r0, r1));
00287 }
